document_data.name: Minda Obarskyr
document_data.mainbody: '''Minda Obarskyr''' (born '''Minda Bleth''') was the sister of [[Mondar Bleth]] and settled on the land that would become known as [[Suzail]] in [[15 DR]]. She had a secret relationship with [[Ondeth Obarskyr]] after his wife had left him that was eventually exposed.
document_data.Appearance: Minda had very dark hair and a pretty face. She was quite tall.
document_data.Relatives: Minda had a brother, [[Mondar Bleth]], who was killed by elves in [[16 DR]]. Her nephew was Mondar's youngest son, [[Arphoind Bleth]].
document_data.History: Minda came to the new settlement on the future site of [[Suzail]] in [[15 DR]]. She later married Ondeth.
